scripts.deploy:browserLambda: aws s3 cp dist/browserLambda.zip s3://safeway-lambdas --profile personal
scripts.deploy:skillLambda: aws s3 cp dist/skillLambda.zip s3://safeway-lambdas --profile personal
scripts.update:browserLambda: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name SafewayBrowser --s3-bucket safeway-lambdas --s3-key browserLambda.zip --profile personal
scripts.update:skillLambda: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name SafewayCartSkill --s3-bucket safeway-lambdas --s3-key skillLambda.zip --profile personal
scripts.deploy: run-s build setup package && run-p deploy:browserLambda && run-p update:browserLambda
